column4: Wow, an s3 virge is a pretty bad video card.  What else do you have.  I doubt vesa supports that.
vesa will not drive any video card.   e.g., it won't worg on an Intel 810, or at least it did not a few months ago when I tried.
vesa works with intel 915. bit of useless info.
vesa mode works at least since the 845 for Intel video.  I don't know about the 815
